name: Cat Cafe Manager
storyline:
You’re moving to Caterwaul village to restore granny’s old cat cafe. It’ll be up to you to turn this old ramshackle ruin into a thriving spot for cats and customers! Win the trust of the town’s stray cat population so you can adopt them into their new forever home, then nurture and train them to delight your customers (and cuddle them lots, too!) Hire and manage your staff, build your food menu, and expand and decorate your cafe in order to meet the needs of the different customer groups that live in Caterwaul.

Befriend the locals who frequent your cafe to learn more about the town in branching dialogues, and uncover the mysteries of the town’s crumbling shrine to an ancient cat god...
summary: In this business management sim you build and manage your own cat cafe, adopt stray cats, and befriend the locals! Collect cafe furniture and food recipes to make your customers feel at home, then use your collection of unique cats to delight them.
